title: Horsing Around!
itunes:title: Horsing Around!
description: The Christmas season is finally here and on today's Cigar Authority we light up the mild+ C & C Connecticut, and the bold A Fuente Anejo. We talk about a new cigar Guiness world record being broken, a flavor ban on tobacco in New York, and a host of strange, but true, stories about cigars. It's time for the finer things in life... It's time for The Cigar Authority!
